actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require most individuals to have as their taxable year a year which will require the filing of tax returns just before the November elections.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the taxable year of individual taxpayers from a calendar year to a year ending on June 30.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require most individuals to have as their taxable year a year which will require the filing of tax returns just before the November elections.
